items.sentence: If you'd asked, I would've helped you do that.
We quickly agreed that we didn't want the job.
This is the only one that I really care about.
Tom's walls are covered with pictures of Mary.
I've been doing this for the past three hours.
How many cafeterias does your university have?
It's quite likely that Tom is already at home.
Men and women find different things important.
I received a message for you from your father.
A hungry heart is worse than a hungry stomach.
I didn't sleep a wink because of your snoring.
It's much cheaper for us to make it ourselves.
Tom tuned his violin and then started to play.
Tom said he didn't to want to talk about Mary.
Tom became convinced Mary no longer loved him.
Tom and Mary both said exactly the same thing.
We finally managed to persuade Tom to help us.
Does Tom go to the same school that Mary does?
Both Tom and Mary said exactly the same thing.
I didn't think this book was very interesting.
